title: ML Stock Price Predictor
description: Advanced machine learning model using LSTM neural networks to predict stock prices. Features real-time data processing, technical indicators, and interactive visualizations with 85% accuracy rate.

title: Gaming Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive gaming analytics platform that scrapes and analyzes gaming trends, player behavior, and market data. Built with interactive dashboards and real-time updates.

title: Book Recommendation Engine
description: Intelligent book recommendation system using collaborative filtering and content-based algorithms. Includes sentiment analysis of reviews and personalized reading suggestions.

title: COVID-19 Data Visualization
description: Interactive data visualization platform tracking COVID-19 trends with predictive modeling. Features geographic mapping, time series analysis, and vaccination tracking.

title: E-commerce Price Monitor
description: Automated price monitoring system for e-commerce platforms with email alerts and trend analysis. Helps users track product prices and find the best deals.

title: Tech News Sentiment Analyzer
description: NLP-powered sentiment analysis tool for tech news articles. Classifies sentiment, extracts key topics, and provides trend insights for technology companies.
